entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: S 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
